title: Gamification-Based Education Program for Decision-Making in Non-Invasive Prenatal Testing (NIPT)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Genetics and Prenatal Testing
context.additional_context: Social decision-making education for experts in the medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of genetics and the NIPT (Non-Invasive Prenatal Testing) process.
Learners can critically analyze NIPT-related information and apply it to decision-making.
Learners can identify and discuss ethical/social issues that may arise when selecting genetic tests.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
